text: Ba bandi babangikanyije Allah bazavuga bati “Iyo Allah aza kubishaka, twe n’abakurambere bacu ntitwari kumubangikanya, kandi nta n’icyo twari kuziririza.” Uko ni na ko abababanjirije bahakanye kugeza ubwo bumvise ububabare bw’ibihano byacu. Vuga uti “Ese mufite ubumenyi (bw’ibyo muvuga) ngo mubutugaragarize? Ahubwo mwe mugendera ku gukekeranya gusa, kandi nta kindi mukora uretse kubeshya.”
